page.title: 13Dunton Village.
page.content: The High Street consists of mainly council houses. In the past there were farm houses but these have now been converted.There are new private dwellings infilling the village. The High Street has the local post office/general store, the cemetery and primary school in it. The primary school has 34 children and 3 teachers. The building has been modernised since the war but mobile classrooms are still used. Although Dunton is a small village, it has a heavy flow of traffic. In a fifteen minute traffic survey, 40 cars, 6 lorries and 6 vans passed through the village. People in Dunton said it was a quiet and pleasant village to live in. The younger generations however thought it lacked evening activities.
